software.title: Software
software.description: Keystore file, Private key, Mnemonic phrase

softwareModal.title: About your Wallet
softwareModal.description: Acquire a hardware wallet for the highest security when accessing your crypto.
softwareModal.notRecommendedDescription:
This is not a recommended way to access your wallet.
Due to the sensitivity of the information involved, these options should only be used in offline settings by experienced users.

extensionModal.title: Access by an extension
extensionModal.description: Keplr is a chrome extension to allow you to handle a wallet on multiple chain on the Cosmos environment including the Lum Network

keplr.title: Keplr extension
keplr.notInstalled: You have to install Keplr extension first

hardwareModal.title: Access by hardware
hardwareModal.description: Choose the application you want to launch on your Ledger dongle
hardwareModal.note: Only Ledger dongles are compatible right now

hardwareModalLoading.title: Waiting for your Ledger

Connecting to your Ledger
Turn on your Ledger, unlock it and open the {{app}} App

lose.title: Don't Lose It
lose.description:
Be careful, it can not be recovered
if you lose it

share.title: Don't Share It
share.description: Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious phishing site.

backup.title: Make a Backup
backup.description:
Secure it like the millions of dollars
it may one day be worth.

send.name: Send
send.description: Send LUM directly to another wallet address

delegate.name: Delegate
delegate.description: Delegate LUM to a network validator address

undelegate.name: Undelegate
undelegate.description: Undelegate LUM from a network validator address

getRewards.name: Get Rewards
getRewards.description: Get LUM rewards from a network validator you delegated to

redelegate.name: Redelegate
redelegate.description: Redelegate LUM from one network validator to another

sign.title: Sign Message
sign.description: Enter a message you want to sign using your wallet. If you share the resulting payload, the receiver will be able to verify that your wallet address signed this message.
sign.disabled: SIGN MESSAGE IS DISABLED FOR EXTENSION WALLETS FOR NOW

signatureModal.title: Signature
signatureModal.copyPayload: Copy this payload to share it so anyone can verify its integrity
